授業目的: Students will be introduced to a wide range of communication strategies at the basic level.
到達目標: Students will be introduced to a wide range of comminication strategies at the basic level aimed at moving them from reading English documents for the purpose of translation into Japanese to managing fiction and non-fiction documents entirely in English. The course will emphasize reading primarily and also speaking, listening, and writing. Course will be conducted in English. Students will learn skills in everyday communication. Students will learn how to communicate with others in a fluent way. Students will also learn good pronunciation in this class
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: From this year 2023, classes will be conducted on campus and face to face.
授業方法: Students will be able to work in groups and use their own ideas. Students will be able to roleplay with others while carrying out various tasks.
